txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive boar, Turch, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

As you inspect Turch's tusks, you are impressed by their condition. At their points, they are as sharp as needles, and despite Turch's age, they show far less wear than those of the other boars in Cardolan. Perhaps Turch was so imposing that he did not often deign to fight his own battles, but judging by your encounter, this was not for lack of skill in combat.

You should bring this trophy to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
Deliver Turch's tusks to Gaerion in Cardolan

Gaerion can be found at Sírlond in Cardolan.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Cardolan. You should deliver it to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
After encountering the elusive boar, Turch, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

'Welcome, traveller. Have you found something new?'

As Gaerion inspects Turch's tusks, he carefully touches the tip of one of the tusks with his finger. Even with a soft touch, he pricks himself, drawing a small amount of blood. He winces slightly, but then his face warms to a smile.

'A mighty beast, even in death. These tusks will make a fine trophy, indeed.

'I shall see that they are well-preserved. You have my thanks!'
